entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to snow or drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
